name: Castle Rush Zombies
description:
Castle Rush Zombies is an exciting tower defense game where players need to defend their castle from zombie attacks. You'll need to develop your economy to produce necessary resources to improve your castle's defense. You'll be able to build towers, set traps, upgrade weapons, and train your soldiers to increase their effectiveness in battle.

In the game, Castle Rush Zombies, you can also build walls that will prevent zombies from entering your castle. You'll be able to sow fields with wheat to produce food for your soldiers and castle inhabitants. Your goal is to protect your castle and save all the inhabitants from the zombie apocalypse. The more zombies you kill, the more experience and resources you'll gain. With each level of difficulty, the challenge will increase, but you can use your knowledge and experience to develop an effective defense strategy. Castle Rush Zombies is an exciting game that will allow you to enjoy an engaging gameplay and train your strategic thinking skills.


Features:
  • Develop your economy to produce the necessary resources for castle defense.
  • Build towers, set traps, and upgrade weapons for your soldiers to increase defense efficiency.
  • Construct walls and plant wheat fields for food production.
  • Each level of difficulty increases, requiring the development of an effective defense strategy.
  • The player gains experience and resources for killing zombies, which helps to improve castle defense.
